entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one giving instructions and making wishes. He says 'It is my wish that you remain' to Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: sibyll
entities.description: Sibyll is a Divination teacher who needs to be escorted back upstairs by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is asked by Dumbledore to escort Sibyll back upstairs.

entities.name: sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout comes hurrying forward and grabs Professor Trelawney's other arm to guide her up the stairs.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is being escorted by Professor Sprout and guided past Umbridge.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick goes scurrying after the group to bring up the rear and make sure Professor Trelawney's luggage follows her.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is standing stock-still, staring at Dumbledore, and asking what he plans to do with Sibyll once she appoints a new Divination teacher.

relationships.description: Dumbledore asks McGonagall for help in escorting Sibyll back upstairs.
Professor Sprout helps guide Professor Trelawney up the stairs.
Professor Flitwick brings up the rear to make sure Professor Trelawney's luggage follows her.
Umbridge asks Dumbledore what he plans to do with Sibyll once she appoints a new Divination teacher.
